section.title: Cloud Scaling
section.para: In &kw-hos-phrase; a total of 200 total compute nodes in a single region across any of the following hypervisors is supported:
You can distribute the compute nodes in any number of deployments as long as the total is no more than 200. Example: 100 ESX + 100 RHEL/KVM or 75 ESX + 25 HPE Linux/KVM + 100 RHEL/KVM.
&kw-hos-phrase; supports a total of 8000 virtual machines across a total of 200 compute nodes.
&kw-hos-phrase; supports 100 baremetal Ironic nodes in a single region.
